sec.p: is a Climate Change Adaptation Specialist at WWF Colombia and a member of the World Commission on Protected Areas (WCPA)-Climate Change Specialist Group. His work includes coordinating development of the “climate smart conservation” approach for the design and implementation of the WWF´s conservation strategies, programmes and projects; climate risk and climate resilience assessments; and international policy work on Biodiversity, Protected Areas and Climate Change under the UN´s Conventions on Biodiversity (CBD) and Climate Change (UNFCCC).
